amendment.description: To permit continuous open enrollment and disenrollment in Medicare Prescription Drug plans and MedicareAdvantage plans until 2008.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 969 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 42. Record Vote Number: 234.

Amendment SA 969 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S8290; text: CR S8290) To permit continuous open enrollment and disenrollment in Medicare Prescription Drug plans and MedicareAdvantage plans until 2008.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 969 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 42. Record Vote Number: 234.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 969 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Dodd.
